channel.title: Personal Podcasts
channel.description: Personal Podcasts is a daily podcast that is automatically generated by content that is curated by the user. It may cover news, articles, or anything else that can be found on the internet.
channel.itunes:author: James Cuénod

item.title: Episode 1: 5 November 2023
item.description: Sources for today's episode may be found here: 1. https://www.economist.com/united-states/2023/10/31/why-doctors-in-america-earn-so-much 2. https://www.theregister.com/2023/11/02/google_abandons_web_environment_integrity/ 3. https://www.nytimes.com/live/2023/11/02/business/sam-bankman-fried-trial 4. https://fortune.com/2023/11/03/bayer-332-million-judgement-trial-man-cancer-decades-monsanto-roundup-weedkiller/ 5. https://ij.org/press-release/victory-appeals-court-unanimously-denies-judicial-immunity-to-west-virginia-judge-who-personally-searched-home-ordered-items-removed

item.title: Episode 2: 6 November 2023
item.description: Sources for today's episode may be found here: 1. https://www.patheos.com/blogs/betweentwokingdoms/2022/11/a-typology-of-conservative-protestants-in-an-anxious-age/ 2. https://www.christianitytoday.com/news/2023/september/methodist-umc-north-carolina-leave-disaffiliate-sue-denomin.html 3. https://www.persecution.com/globalprayerguide/cuba/ 4. https://www.9marks.org/article/how-did-church-planting-movements-gain-a-foothold-within-the-imb/ 5. https://africa.thegospelcoalition.org/article/history-christianity-africa/ 6. https://africa.thegospelcoalition.org/article/are-dreams-and-visions-messages-from-god-africa-study-bible/
